text:
June (https://juneoven.com/) is hiring! | Full-time | SF

June is a team on a mission to transform the kitchen. Our first product is the June Intelligent Oven. A built-in camera and sensors makes June able to identify commonly cooked foods, recommend a cooking program and execute to perfection. With a touch screen, instant-on carbon fiber heating elements, advanced moulded insulation and a finely tuned cooking cavity, weâ€™re bringing restaurant-level performance to the home.

We're looking for Software and Hardware engineers.

See https://juneoven.com/jobs.html
